Module it.unipr.client
Package it.unipr.utilities

Class Utilities

java.lang.Object
it.unipr.utilities.Utilities
public final class Utilities extends Object
This class provides utilities to the module, for example the ShowAlert method that takes as input title, header and content and produces an alert window
Since:
1.0
Version:
1.0
Author:
Tanzi Manuel 307720, Mamone Maximiliano 308214

    • loadScene

      public static <T> javafx.fxml.FXMLLoader loadScene (javafx.stage.Stage stage, String file, String title, Class<T> c)
      This method allows loading and setting a scene replacing the active scene
      Type Parameters:
      T - class token used to retrieve resources
      Parameters:
      stage - the active stage
      file - the fxml file to load as next scene
      title - the title for the new scene
      c - generic instance of T class
      Returns:
      FXMLLoader object containing the scene
      Since:
      1.0

    • showAlert

      public static void showAlert (String title, String header, String text)
      This method generates an alert window based on the parameters
      Parameters:
      title - used to set the title of the alert window
      header - used to set the header of the alert window
      text - used to set the content of the alert window
      Since:
      1.0

    • showConfirmation

      public static Boolean showConfirmation (String title, String header, String text)
      This method generates an alert window based on the parameters that waits for a negative or positive response from the user
      Parameters:
      title - Title of the alert window
      header - Header of the alert window
      text - Content of the alert window
      Returns:
      true or false based on the response of the user
